overview: Elton joined Northern Light in 2006. Previously, he co-founded and directed e-Rainbowâ€™s wireless advertising business, and worked for The Hina Group as an investment banker helping technology companies in fundraising and cross-border M&A. Elton has many years of experience in venture capital investments in China. He started his VC career in 1998 with IDG VC and continuously focused on IT, Telecom and Media industries. During his employment at Shanghai Information Investment (SII), he played important roles in a number of significant strategic investment transactions in partnership with big MNCs, and led the VC investment in Target Media, etc. Elton holds a MA degree in investment management with high honors from Shanghai University of Finance and Economics and double BS in Electronics Engineering and International Trade with high honors from Shanghai JiaoTong University. He is a CFA Charter holder.
